tags.name: Restaurant Room Management
tags.description: Controller for managing restaurant room operations

tags.name: Restaurant Customer
tags.description: Controller for restaurant operators to manage customer data

tags.name: Service Management
tags.description: Controller for managing services offered by restaurants

tags.name: Restaurant Slot Management
tags.description: Controller for managing restaurant slot operations

tags.name: FCM
tags.description: Restaurant User FCM token management API

tags.name: Restaurant Table Management

tags.name: Restaurant Verification
tags.description: API for restaurant verification via Google. FLOW: 1) User authorizes scopes (userinfo.email, userinfo.profile, business.manage) 2) get-restaurants → user's restaurant list 3) select-restaurant → final choice

tags.name: Restaurant Information Management
tags.description: Controller for managing restaurant information and settings

tags.name: Restaurant Reservations
tags.description: API per gestire prenotazioni ristoranti tramite Google Reserve API. Permette di creare, modificare e cancellare prenotazioni.

put.description: Endpoint to mark a reservation as seated by its ID
Endpoint to reject a reservation by its ID

put.summary: Mark a reservation as no show
put.description: Endpoint to mark a reservation as no show by its ID
Endpoint to accept a reservation by its ID
Endpoint to accept a reservation modification request by its ID
Confirms the password change using a token
Sets the notification with the given ID as the given read boolean
Sets all notifications for the given user as read
Modifica una prenotazione esistente con nuovi dettagli. Può cambiare data, ora, numero di persone e richieste speciali.

delete.description: Cancella una prenotazione esistente. Richiede l'ID della prenotazione e un motivo opzionale.

post.description: Select and verify a specific restaurant via placeId (STEP 2). Uses the same Access Token from STEP 1
Search for a restaurant on Google Maps without OAuth verification (for testing only)
Gets the list of all restaurants that the user can manage (STEP 1). Requires Access Token with scopes: userinfo.email, userinfo.profile, business.manage

post.summary: Remove a role from a restaurant user
post.description: Remove a specific role from an existing restaurant user

post.summary: Generate new token for password change
post.description: Changes the user's password after verifying the old password

post.summary: Add a user to a restaurant
post.description: Add a new user to a restaurant

get.summary: Get FCM token by device ID
get.description: Retrieves the FCM token associated with a specific device ID

post.description: Registers a new FCM token for a device of the restaurant user
Refresh a restaurant user JWT token using a refresh token
Refresh a hub JWT token using a hub refresh token
Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token or a selection token if multiple restaurants are available
Authenticates a restaurant user hub using Google OAuth2

post.summary: Add a role to a restaurant user
post.description: Assign a specific role to an existing restaurant user

post.summary: Add a table to a room
post.description: Add a new table to a specific room
This method creates a new slot.
This method creates a new service in the system.

post.summary: Add a room to a restaurant
post.description: Add a new room to a restaurant
Endpoint to create a new reservation
Sends a password reset token to the restaurant user's email

post.summary: Request to register a new restaurant
post.description: Request to register a new restaurant

post.summary: Change restaurant and get a new JWT
post.description: Switches the restaurant and returns a new JWT for the specified restaurant ID
Create a new dish for the current restaurant

post.summary: Add a dish to a menu
post.description: Add a priced dish to an existing menu
Create a new menu for the current restaurant

post.summary: Remove a category from the restaurant
post.description: Remove a category from the authenticated restaurant
Set the time limit for no-show reservations

post.summary: Add a category to the restaurant
post.description: Add a new category to the authenticated restaurant
Crea una nuova prenotazione del ristorante tramite Google Reserve API. Restituisce i dettagli della prenotazione e l'ID di conferma.

get.description: Retrieve details of the current restaurant user
Restituisce i permessi dell'utente autenticato

get.summary: Select a restaurant after intermediate login
get.description: Given a hub JWT and a restaurantId, returns a JWT for the selected restaurant user

get.summary: Get list of restaurants for hub user
get.description: Given a hub JWT, returns the list of restaurants associated with the hub user
Retrieve the tables of a specific room
Retrieve a slot by its ID

get.summary: Get day slots of the authenticated restaurant
get.description: Retrieve the daily slots of the authenticated restaurant

get.summary: Get all slots of the authenticated restaurant
get.description: Retrieve all available slots for the authenticated restaurant
Retrieve a service by its ID.

get.summary: Get all slots of a service
get.description: Retrieve all slots associated with a specific service by its ID.
Retrieve all service types.
Retrieve the services of a restaurant
Retrieve the rooms of a restaurant

get.summary: Get all reservations of a restaurant
get.description: Retrieve all reservations of a restaurant

get.summary: Get all pending reservations of a restaurant
get.description: Retrieve all pending reservations of a restaurant with optional date filtering

get.summary: Get all reservations of a restaurant with pagination
get.description: Retrieve all reservations of a restaurant with pagination

get.summary: Get all accepted reservations of a restaurant

Conferma la registrazione

Returns a pageable list of all notifications

get.summary: Get active and enabled services of the authenticated restaurant for a specific period
get.description: Retrieve the services of the authenticated restaurant that are active and enabled in a given date range

get.summary: Get active and enabled services of the authenticated restaurant for a specific date
get.description: Retrieve the services of the authenticated restaurant that are active and enabled on a given date
Retrieves statistics for a specific customer including no-show rate, reservations count, etc.

rememberMe.description: Remember me option for longer session

refreshToken.description: JWT refresh token for remember me functionality

totalReservations.description: Total number of reservations made by the customer

totalCount.description: Total number of items in the list

count.description: Number of items returned in this response

post_code.description: Postal code (optional, will be auto-filled from geocoding)

vatNumber.description: International VAT/Tax number following country-specific format

first.description: Whether this is the first page

last.description: Whether this is the last page

numberOfElements.description: Number of elements in current page

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

error.description: Error details (present only if success = false)
